oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Ted Jarrett Tribute - 2005-12-03 - tape two of two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tribute and performances honoring Ted Jarrett from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 3, 2005. Tape two of two. Program coincides with the publication of Ted Jarrett's biography You Can Make It If You Try.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Jones; James "Nick" Nixon; Michael Gray; Vera Allen; Tracy Nelson; Jo-el Wright; Dynamic Dixie Travelers; Melvin Bufford and God's Army; Ted Jarrett;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Program hosted by Michael Gray. Comments from Johnny Jones -- Gotta Stop Loving You (James "Nick" Nixon and Vera Allen) -- If I Didn't Have My Baby (Tracy Nelson) -- You Are My Love (Jo-el Wright) -- Stay A Little Longer (Jo-el Wright) -- God Will Provide (Dynamic Dixie Travelers) - So Much To Be Thankful For (Dynamic Dixie Travelers) -- I Believe In Miracles (Melvin Bufford and God's Army) -- All Things Are Possible With God (Melvin Bufford and God's Army) -- Michael Gray with presentation of Ted Jarrett appreciation certificate from the Nashville Mayor's office -- Comments from Ted Jarrett.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gray, Michael; Jones, Johnny; Nixon, James; Allen, Vera; Nelson, Tracy; Wright, Jo-el; Dynamic Dixie Travelers (Musical group); Melvin Bufford and God's Army (Musical group); Jarrett, Ted; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
